name: The Large Integer
short_description:
It a composite of the structure "largeInt", and of many functions that modify this "largeInt" data set. The structure "largeInt" consists of an integer array allocated using dynamic memory allocation, each base[] representing nine digits at a time. It also has a boolean isPositive variable, and an integer numberOfValues, representing the number of base[] integers.
Currently there is an addition, subtraction, and multiplication function available for use. The division function will be coming soon. While decimals are currently no supported, positive and negative numbers are.
summary: A large integer that is programmed in C
